title: Fix 'Armor Bearers' label under Get Involved and refresh ministry page imagery to a modern, youthful look

requirements.text: Update the Ministry Auxiliaries item currently labeled “Altar Bearers” (user referred to it as “Alter Bearers”) to instead display the title “Armor Bearers” under the Get Involved page.

quotes: Under Ministry Auxiliaries, you need to edit where it says Alter Bearers. That should be Armor Bearers. Edit that. It should be under Get Involved. And under Ministry Auxiliaries, Alter Bearers should be Armor Bearers.

acceptanceCriteria: On /get-involved, within the “Ministry Auxiliaries” grid, the item title reads “Armor Bearers”.
No visible occurrences of “Alter Bearers” or “Altar Bearers” remain on the Get Involved page.

requirements.text: Replace the ministry page images that currently appear outdated (70s/80s look) with new, modern 21st-century visuals that reflect young, vibrant leadership; update the Ministries page image catalog to use the new assets.

quotes: Change these pictures out and make them look up-to-date. They look older, in the 70s or 80s.
So the pictures on the ministry webpage should reflect a young vibe. We don't have old leadership. We have young, vibrant leadership over this ministry. And the webpage images should reflect that.

acceptanceCriteria: The images shown in the Ministries page “Ministry Seals” section use newly generated, modern-looking assets (not the prior dated-looking images).
New images are stored as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced from the frontend (not served via the backend).
All updated ministry images visually read as modern/current (clean typography, contemporary photo/graphic style, vibrant and youthful tone).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose only).
Backend must remain single-actor (all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo); no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication methods or third-party integrations.
Do not introduce new ministry sections or change site routing beyond the requested text and image updates.

required: Modern, vibrant church ministry collage with diverse young adults, warm lighting, contemporary color grading (ministry-seals-modern-collage.dim_1200x1200.png)
Modern event flyer-style graphic with contemporary typography and abstract gradients, clean layout, 21st-century design (gathering-at-6-modern-flyer.dim_1200x1200.png)
Modern ‘Save the Date’ flyer-style graphic with bold contemporary typography, bright accents, minimal layout (save-the-date-modern-flyer.dim_1200x1200.png)
Modern community outreach photo-style visual with young volunteers, candid energy, contemporary editing (church-outreach-modern.dim_1200x1200.png)
